name: Laser Blast: The Game! FebMoVid 2016
description:
Point and click your way through a harrowing mission to rid the Royal Cinema of Hologram Men in this lo-res tribute to FMV games of yore! A team effort by the Laser Blast Film Society and the Hand Eye Society for FebMoVid 2016: A celebration of Full Motion Video games held at the Royal Cinema on College Street in Toronto. Audience members used laser pointers and were encouraged to shout to indicate their collective choices. See also: Fantastic Motion Video, shot on-site at the Alamo Drafthouse during Fantastic Fest 2016.

Starring Peter Kuplowsky and Justin Decloux; programming by Sagan Yee; cinematography by Nate Wilson.

HOW TO PLAY
Just use your mouse to point and click! Your cursor will turn red when placed over a hotspot. Don't shoot the innocent theatre-goers; they're just here to watch a movie for cryin' out loud!
